alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:59PM EST until January 10 at 11:55PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New York NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...From this evening to late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 2.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 8.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 03/07/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Saddle River Lodi 5.5 2.6 Tue 2 pm EST 5.1 3.0 2.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Even 6 inches of fast-moving flood water can knock you off your feet and a depth of 2 feet will float your car. Never try to walk, swim, or drive through such swift water. If you come upon flood waters, stop, turn around and go another way. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 300 AM EST.
